abilities.name: granite shield
abilities.description: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for 10 seconds, this effect recharges.

abilities.name: seismic shard
abilities.description: Using his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: thunderclap
abilities.description: Malphite attacks with such force that it creates a sonic boom. For the next few seconds, his attacks create aftershocks in front of him.

abilities.name: ground slam
abilities.description: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.

abilities.name: unstoppable force
abilities.description: Malphite ferociously charges to a location, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.
